title: Pixel Perfect { Vintage Tech }
content:
This one’s for the gamers and tech-loving couples whose tapestry of love is woven out of pixels! If you really think about it, this theme is all about playing with the square and the cube – so bear that in mind when planning your pixel perfect wedding! 
  Create your own pixelated monogram or make up a bigger shape out of a whole lot of small pictures of the two of you.  Have guests write their special notes on square post-its and stick it on a wall to create a giant pixelated piece of art – you can even frame it that way!  Add a touch of sophistication with square pixel-inspired treats like big plates of petit fours.  In terms of chairs and seating (especially at the cocktail party), opt for square ottomans.  Rent a couple of arcade games or large square building blocks to entertain guests at the pre-drinks. You can even have prizes to keep the spirits high!  Draw inspiration from old vintage pixel-drive arcade games like Pacman and Tetris for your stationery and décor designs.  Combine vintage and tech by using the cross-stitching technique (which resembles pixels) to decorate napkins and dresses.  Opt for a checkerboard dance floor to further enhance the pixel theme.
